TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you already have never made that wish.

I wish that the Concorde was still in service.

Granted. I'M THE PILOT. >:3

I wish America would give up on it's silly F-35 project (that damn thing has cost billions of dollars and it still barely works, they had to ground the fleet again due to malfunctions)

Amen, and granted, and they spend the money on more F 22s

I wish that I could connect to the internet at all times

Granted, but but the internet is now made of wood.

I wish that Anime was best entertainment.

Granted. It's now banned to anyone outside of Japan without a permit, illegal posession results in a $50,000 fine and up to 10 years in prison.

I wish I had more pizza.

granted but it has the most disgusting inggredients on it

I wish that my physics teacher wasnt terrrible

Granted, your physics assignment for the whole year is now a grand tour of Kerbol.

I wish KurtJMac would do KSP videos more often.

Granted. I go back in time and stab your grandfather with a bayonet while dressed as a member of the Wehrmacht

I wish I could go back in time and stab Bioman's grandfather with a bayonet while dressed as a member of the Wehrmacht

Granted, but your time machine breaks and you instead arrive at the battle of Stalingrad, where you slowly die from starvation and cold.

I wish my drawing tablet wasn't glitchy as hell.

granted, but now it's in hell.

I wish that I could recharge my ipod without any power cord

Granted, but as you pick up your ipod, it melts... your hand. Not to worry however, the device itself has taken no damage at all

I wish that I was a stowaway on Apollo 11.

Granted, but they don't share any water with you, so you die of dehydration.

I wish for space tourism to become cheap enough for average people in my lifetime.

Granted, but it's horrendously unsafe.

I wish they'd release some more Doctor Who now.

Granted, but the show is now called Doctor What. Confusion ensues.

I wish that Earth was renamed Earf.

Granted, it is now led by Super President Will Smith, whose entire election campaign was him punching an alien in the face and shouting WELCOME TO EARF

I wish my army on Laythe was ready for the invasion of Kerbin

Granted, but it won't even leave Kerbin.

My wish is a paradoxical wish.

Granted, but the universe explodes in the end. I wish for a whole populated planet that loves me and follows my every command, and the planet is the strongest in the universe and nothing will ever hurt it, me, or it's inhabitants. The inhabitants will never damage anything and ave high levels of technology. I am immortal as are they. No, there can not be "only one"

Granted, but it won't even leave Kerbin.

My wish is a paradoxical wish.

Granted. You wished you never wished it.

I wish I could go at the speed of light on demand.

Granted. The G-forces squished you into a nice soup of Moustache with extra lamb!

I wish I could wish!

Granted. The G-forces squished you into a nice soup of Moustache with extra lamb!

I wish I could wish!

Granted, but your wish was already selected, and the wish was for you to become a Squid. Then you ran out of wishes.

I wish I could go to Pluto

Granted. You didn't want a rocket or space suit with that, did you?

I wish it wasn't so rainy in Washington.

Granted. Every rain droplet that would have been has been replaced with hail.

I wish that Florida Man wasn't such a bad superhero.

Granted, but he then steals Florida for no discernible reason.

I wish that I had a airbus.

Granted. It's a city bus flying in the air.

I wish for a mango.
